articles.title: Spread of hepatitis A virus strains of genotype IB in several EU countries and the United Kingdom - European Centre for Disease
articles.description: Clusters and outbreaks of hepatitis A virus (HAV) genotype IB with four unique but closely related HAV sequences have been reported in six European Union (EU) countries and in the United Kingdom (UK).
